#labels Phase-Deploy,Build,Install,Ubuntu
= Building !PyLorcon2 =

= Ubuntu =

This was tested on Ubuntu 9.10 Desktop

Install necessary software to build lorcon2 and pylorcon2.

{{{
$ sudo aptitude install libpcap-dev libnl-dev python-dev
...
}}}

Donwload Lorcon2, build it and install it.

{{{
$ svn co http://802.11ninja.net/lorcon/svn/lorcon/trunk lorcon2
...
$ cd lorcon2
$ ./configure --libdir=/usr/lib
...
$ make
...
$ sudo make install
...
}}}

Donwload !PyLorcon2, build it, install it and test it.

{{{
$ svn co http://pylorcon2.googlecode.com/svn/trunk pylorcon2
...
$ cd pylorcon2
...
$ python setup.py build
...
$ python setup.py install
...
}}}

Now we can test it.

{{{
$ python
